scripts.migrate: dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.local prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.local node prisma/triggers/trigger.mjs && dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.local node prisma/stored/procedure.mjs
scripts.dbDeploy: dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.prod prisma migrate deploy && dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.prod node prisma/triggers/trigger.mjs && dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.prod node prisma/stored/procedure.mjs
scripts.create0init: rm -rf prisma/schema/migrations && mkdir -p prisma/schema/migrations/0_init && prisma migrate diff --from-empty --to-schema-datamodel prisma/schema --script > prisma/schema/migrations/0_init/migration.sql
scripts.migrateFunctions: dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.local node prisma/triggers/trigger.mjs && dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.local node prisma/stored/procedure.mjs
scripts.prod:migrateFunctions: dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.prod node prisma/triggers/trigger.mjs && dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.prod node prisma/stored/procedure.mjs
scripts.dbDiff: dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.local prisma migrate diff -- --from-schema-datasource prisma/schema/schema.prisma --to-schema-datamodel prisma/schema
scripts.pull: dotenv -e ../../envs/.env.local prisma migrate diff -- --from-empty --to-schema-datasource prisma/schema/schema.prisma --script > prisma/schema/tmp/migration.sql
